title: 116J.411 DEFINITIONS.
text:
For the purposes of sections 116J.411 to 116J.415, the following terms have the meaning given them.
"Commissioner" means the commissioner of employment and economic development.
"Job enhancement" means:
(1) an increase in wages, and an increase in the responsibility or skill level of job duties; or
(2) the provision of additional training or education for employees in existing jobs.
[Repealed, 2003 c 128 art 13 s 40]
"Low income" means equal to or below the nonmetropolitan median household income.
"Principally" means more than half.
"Regional organization" or "organization" means an organization selected under section 116J.415, subdivision 3.
"Rural" means the area of Minnesota located outside of the metropolitan area as defined in section 473.121, subdivision 2.
